body: I wonder if I should add a whatsnew entry for this, and if so, in which file?
though you could add in the perf section if you want (but you will need to wait for us to create the 0.22 notes); releasing 0.21.0 shortly.
The latest changes should address your comments.

> The diff coverage is `100%`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/17956/graphs/tree.svg?width=650&height=150&src=pr&token=eZ4WkYLtcO)](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/17956?src=pr&el=tree)

- Misses       4390     4399       +9
